# ✅ 문제

## 1️⃣ 코딩

### (1) 상태 플래그



is_on 컬럼을 만들어라.



state == "on" → True



그 외 → False



### (2) 연속 ON 구간 탐지



아래 정의를 만족하는 연속 ON 구간을 모두 찾아라.



정의:



is_on == True가 2개 이상 연속되는 구간만 인정



각 구간에 대해:



start_time



end_time



duration



정의: end_time - start_time



결과를 다음 컬럼을 가진 DataFrame df_on으로 만들어라.



start_time	end_time	duration



### ⚠️ 주의



시간은 time_min 값을 그대로 사용



loop 사용 금지



## 2️⃣ 분석



df_on에 mean_power 컬럼을 추가하라.



정의: 해당 ON 구간 동안의 power 평균



힌트: 브로드캐스팅으로 구간 mask를 확장해 계산



duration이 가장 긴 구간의



start_time, end_time

를 각각 longest_start, longest_end에 저장하라.



## 3️⃣ 시각화 (조건 엄수)

Figure: power over time + ON 구간 강조



figure size: (7, 4)



x축: time_min



y축: power



marker: o



title: "Power Usage Over Time"



xlabel: "Time (min)"



ylabel: "Power"



grid: 표시 ✅



legend: 표시 ❌



df_on에 포함된 모든 ON 구간을



연한 파란색(span)으로 강조



color: "lightblue"



alpha: 0.3



## ❗ 조건 요약



pandas + matplotlib만 사용



for / while ❌



groupby, rolling, cumsum, pivot ❌



문제에 없는 시각 요소 추가 ❌

#  데이터

```python
import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame({
    "time_min": [0, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45],
    "state":    ["off","on","on","on","off","on","on","off","off","on"],
    "power":    [0,    5,   6,   6,   0,    7,   8,   0,   0,    9]
})

display(df)
```

# 풀이

```python
df['is_on']= df['state'].map({'on': True, 'off': False})
display(df)
```

```python
mask_start = (df['is_on']&~df['is_on'].shift(periods=1, fill_value=False))
mask_end = (df['is_on']&~df['is_on'].shift(periods=-1, fill_value=False))
import numpy as np
time_start = df.loc[mask_start, 'time_min'].to_numpy()
time_end = df.loc[mask_end, 'time_min'].to_numpy()
df_on = pd.DataFrame({'start_time': time_start, 'end_time': time_end})
df_on['duration'] = df_on['end_time']-df_on['start_time']
count = in_span.sum(axis=0)
df_on = df_on.loc[count >= 2].reset_index(drop=True)
display(mask_start, mask_end, df_on)
```

```
0    False
1     True
2    False
3    False
4    False
5     True
6    False
7    False
8    False
9     True
Name: is_on, dtype: bool
```

```
4    False
```

```python
minute = df["time_min"].to_numpy()[:, None]
start  = df_on["start_time"].to_numpy()[None, :]
end  = df_on["end_time"].to_numpy()[None, :]
in_span = (minute >= start) & (minute <=end)
keep = in_span.sum(axis=0) >= 2
df_on = df_on.loc[keep].reset_index(drop=True)
in_span = in_span[:, keep]
power = df['power'].to_numpy()[:, None]
masked = np.where(in_span, power, 0)
df_on['mean_power'] = masked.sum(axis=0)/in_span.sum(axis=0)
longest_start, longest_end = df_on.iloc[df_on['duration'].idxmax()][['start_time','end_time']]
display(minute, start, end, in_span, df_on, longest_start, longest_end)
```

```
array([[ 0],
       [ 5],
       [10],
       [15],
       [20],
       [25],
       [30],
       [35],
       [40],
       [45]])
```

```
array([[ 5, 25]])
```

```
array([[15, 30]])
```

```
array([[False, False],
       [ True, False],
       [ True, False],
       [ True, False],
       [False, False],
       [False,  True],
       [False,  True],
       [False, False],
       [False, False],
       [False, False]])
```

```python
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(7,4))
ax.plot(df['time_min'], df['power'], marker= 'o')
ax.set_title("Power Usage Over Time")
ax.set_xlabel("Time (min)")
ax.set_ylabel("Power")
ax.grid(True)
# highlight all high segments (union mask across segments)
in_any = in_span.any(axis=1)  # (N,)
ymin, ymax = ax.get_ylim()
ax.fill_between(df["time_min"], ymin, ymax, where=in_any, color="lightblue", alpha=0.3)
```

```
<matplotlib.collections.FillBetweenPolyCollection at 0x206ded0d450>
```

![output](data:image/png;base64,)

# 해답

```python
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# -----------------------------
# Data
# -----------------------------
df = pd.DataFrame({
    "time_min": [0, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45],
    "state":    ["off","on","on","on","off","on","on","off","off","on"],
    "power":    [0,    5,   6,   6,   0,    7,   8,   0,   0,    9]
})

# -----------------------------
# 1) is_on
# -----------------------------
df2 = df.copy()
df2["is_on"] = df2["state"].eq("on")

# -----------------------------
# 2) Find ON segments (>=2 consecutive points)
# -----------------------------
start_mask = df2["is_on"] & ~df2["is_on"].shift(1, fill_value=False)
end_mask   = df2["is_on"] & ~df2["is_on"].shift(-1, fill_value=False)

start_times = df2.loc[start_mask, "time_min"].to_numpy()
end_times   = df2.loc[end_mask,   "time_min"].to_numpy()

df_on = pd.DataFrame({"start_time": start_times, "end_time": end_times})

# Build membership matrix (N,K)
t = df2["time_min"].to_numpy()[:, None]               # (N,1)
s = df_on["start_time"].to_numpy()[None, :]           # (1,K)
e = df_on["end_time"].to_numpy()[None, :]             # (1,K)
in_span = (t >= s) & (t <= e)                          # (N,K)

# Keep only segments with >=2 points
count = in_span.sum(axis=0)                            # (K,)
keep = count >= 2
df_on = df_on.loc[keep].reset_index(drop=True)
in_span = in_span[:, keep]
count = count[keep]

# duration = end - start
df_on["duration"] = df_on["end_time"] - df_on["start_time"]

# -----------------------------
# 3) mean_power per segment
# -----------------------------
p = df2["power"].to_numpy()[:, None]                   # (N,1)
masked = np.where(in_span, p, 0.0)                     # (N,K')
df_on["mean_power"] = masked.sum(axis=0) / count

# -----------------------------
# 4) Longest segment
# -----------------------------
i_long = df_on["duration"].idxmax()
longest_start = df_on.loc[i_long, "start_time"]
longest_end   = df_on.loc[i_long, "end_time"]

# -----------------------------
# 5) Plot: power over time + ON spans
# -----------------------------
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(7, 4))
ax.plot(df2["time_min"], df2["power"], marker="o")
ax.set_title("Power Usage Over Time")
ax.set_xlabel("Time (min)")
ax.set_ylabel("Power")
ax.grid(True)

# Highlight union of ON spans (single call, no loops)
in_any = in_span.any(axis=1)                           # (N,)
ymin, ymax = ax.get_ylim()
ax.fill_between(df2["time_min"], ymin, ymax, where=in_any, color="lightblue", alpha=0.3)

plt.show()

df_on, longest_start, longest_end
```

![output](data:image/png;base64,)

```
(   start_time  end_time  duration  mean_power
 0           5        15        10    5.666667
 1          25        30         5    7.500000,
 np.int64(5),
 np.int64(15))
```
